title: League of Legends Client won't launch
body:
I really need help! Recently my League of Legends Client just _stopped working!_

I tried everything I could think of, I ran the application as administrator countless times, troubleshooted compatibility, reinstalled the game twice, and followed countless forum and Reddit instructions on the topic, which included deleting files and re-running the program, I even tried managing the hard-drive to get it to work!

What I do exactly is double-click or right click and run as administrator, the League of Legends Icon Badge pops up, loads, and disappears, like normal, but then nothing happens, nothing at all, I went into Task Manager and the LoL Launcher and LoL Patcher were running tasks, but they weren't showing up on the Desktop or doing anything at all.

The only thing I can possibly come up with at this point is to reinstall Windows, and I'm not doing that, it's not an option.

Please help! I've tried everything I know!

replies.body:
It sounds like you've taken a lot of logical steps in an effort to resolve this. One thing I can think of potentially still being a problem is if you have a Firewall or Antivirus program that could block League from running. I definitely recommend [configuring your Firewall](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3) to allow League to run. Alternatively, you can disable your Firewall/AV entirely to see if League will launch afterward.

Let me know if these steps caused any change.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=UzfyY3Ky,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-13T22:31:50.758+0000)
>
> It sounds like you've taken a lot of logical steps in an effort to resolve this. One thing I can think of potentially still being a problem is if you have a Firewall or Antivirus program that could block League from running. I definitely recommend [configuring your Firewall](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3) to allow League to run. Alternatively, you can disable your Firewall/AV entirely to see if League will launch afterward.
> 
> Let me know if these steps caused any change.

No, I checked Firewall and my antivirus software and they were both letting LoL run, also, I hadn't changed any settings on them, so that makes sense as LoL was working fine just a little while ago.
I tried to completely disable Firewall and run LoL like that, but it still didn't work.

It sounds like we'll need to dig a bit deeper in order to find a solution for this. I strongly recommend reaching out to our tech team in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) If you run a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach them to your ticket, it will expedite your service.

If you have any questions, please let me know.

I have run the diagnostics on the Hextech Repair Tool and it failed to copy several Client Logs, but it claimed that the game was working perfectly fine, even though it's not, I submitted a ticket with the Logs attached to it, I hope it'll help.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=UzfyY3Ky,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-14T16:05:22.000+0000)
>
> It sounds like we'll need to dig a bit deeper in order to find a solution for this. I strongly recommend reaching out to our tech team in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) If you run a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach them to your ticket, it will expedite your service.
> 
> If you have any questions, please let me know.

Thank you, I will do that. Though previous Troubleshooting Applications and the like did not work or couldn't identify the problem.
